title: Sword Immortal In Another World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Martial Arts   Mystery   Slice of Life   Supernatural   Xianxia
tags: Angels   Cultivation   Immortals   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Poor Protagonist   Strong to Stronger   Sword Wielder
author: Hypoxic Oxygen Cylinder   缺氧的氧气瓶
description:
After cultivating for a hundred years, I ascended to the celestial realm.

I thought the celestial ream was covered with clouds and mist and immortals were free and unrestrained

But I didn’t expect…

Without money, I was struggling with every step.

I could only rely on the unfitting sword skills of mine to become an adventurer.

In order to defeat the strongest magical beast in the celestial realm – slime, I gathered partners and constantly looked for stronger equipment!>
